plugins.name: Easy Task Prioritiser
plugins.description:
Easy Task Prioritiser Quickly organize and rank your tasks using two proven prioritization frameworks — right inside Figma.


✨ How It Works

🔢 Stack Ranking

Go to the Stack tab.

Enter your list of tasks.

Click Start Comparison to begin.

You’ll be shown two tasks at a time — choose which is more important.

Repeat until all tasks are compared and ranked.

In the end:

You'll get a clear, ranked list of tasks

You can Copy to Clipboard or Push to Canvas to bring the list into your Figma file


🧠 MoSCoW Prioritization

Switch to the MoSCoW tab.

Add your tasks.

For each task, select whether it’s a Must, Should, Could, or Won’t.

Once done, use Push to Canvas to generate a structured visual layout by category.

In the end:

You can Copy to Clipboard or Push to Canvas to see tasks grouped by priority


This plugin is perfect for product teams, designers, and facilitators who want to make prioritization decisions quickly — and stay focused on what matters most.
plugins.tagline: Turn messy task lists into clear priorities.

plugins.name: FileDetox
plugins.description: FileDetox is a powerful Figma cleanup tool that hunts down and eliminates the hidden clutter slowing down your design files. With its distinctive neo-brutalist interface, FileDetox quickly identifies hidden layers, empty frames, unused styles, and off-canvas elements that contribute to file bloat. In just a few clicks, purge unnecessary elements and optimize your workflow. Design with intention, not with digital baggage. Made by gautham.
plugins.tagline: Design Detoxification. Simplified.

plugins.name: Draft Alpha
plugins.description:
DraftAlpha – Figma Plugin

Deliver consistent UX content aligned with your brand guidelines


DraftAlpha enables you to effortlessly create, collaborate, and maintain brand-consistent UX content directly within Figma.


Key Features:


✅ AI-powered Brand Guidelines Builder

- Instantly generate tailored brand guidelines, including writing rules, tone of voice, target audience, and brand pillars.

- Customize guidelines precisely to reflect your brand identity.


✅ Content Consistency & Compliance

- Automatically check content for adherence to your established brand guidelines.

- Generate multiple content variants aligned with your brand.


✅ Centralized Content & Collaboration

- Single source of truth for all UX copy and team collaboration.

- Approval workflows, user roles, and content status management.

- Build reusable content components with localization support.


✅ Seamless Localization

- Quickly generate brand-consistent localized content in 20+ languages.

- Manage and apply localization variants directly in Figma.


✅ Integrated Figma Workflow

- Access your content library and apply content to designs instantly.

- Real-time brand guideline compliance checking within your design files.

- Effortlessly preview designs across multiple language variants.
plugins.tagline: Deliver UX Content consistent with brand guidelines

plugins.name: Mode Match
plugins.description:
Mode Match lets you take a variable's value from one mode and apply it to other modes. Match a single variable, group of variables, or all variables in a collection!


  1. Select your multi-mode collection
  2. Select the source mode (copy from)
  3. Select the destination mode (copy to)
  4. Enter the path to a group of variables or a single variable (see below for bulk actions)
  5. Update ✨


Tip

  1. Keep your variable window open to see the changes.
  2. Use the Refresh button to pull in changes to the variables made when the plugin window is open. (see below for copy & paste)
  3. Use clear to quickly delete the path.


Bulk Actions

You will most likely want to run this on a group or the entire collection:

  1. Update all variables within a group by entering a path/to/group
  2. Update all variables in the collection by entering / @all or @root in the path input


Plugin Notes

  1. Collection list will only show collections with more than 1 mode
  2. Variable names and paths are case sensitive
  3. Updating variables, especially those linked to text styles may take longer to propagate


Supports

  1. All variable types (number, string, boolean, color)
  2. Aliasing
  3. Raw values


Copy/Paste Figma Bug

If you copy/paste variables between collections, you may need to reload the tab in order for those variables to register in their new collection.

accepted.name: Murph
accepted.description: Systems Designer • Plugin Author • Rectangle Lover

plugins.tagline: Match variable values across modes.

plugins.name: Page Assistant
plugins.description:
A 🗂️ Page Assistant to help you quickly set up your files and pages structure the way you want them; on new or existing files. No more need for duplicating template files.


§ Sections

Automatically apply your desired file sections with dividers on existing or new files.


⚙️ Customizable

Customize these sections name and order to your specific needs, and save your preferences for future use.


✏️ Page names

Batch-apply a page name prefix and/or suffix to all non-section pages.


This is a work in progress. All feedback is welcome!

accepted.name: alfonso
accepted.description:
Designer and artist from Uruguay, based in New York City.

Currently Director, Product Design at Fabric Health. Ex. Particle Health

plugins.tagline: Add and remove sections on your file & format page names

plugins.name: MoveQuack
plugins.description:
Feature Overview

This plugin allows users to set customizable timers for both work and break periods, catering to individual needs.


Key Features

Customizable Timer: Set specific times for work and rest, with full flexibility.

Timed Reminders: Automatically alerts users when it's time to take a break, preventing overwork.

Boost Efficiency and Health: Helps maintain high productivity while ensuring overall well-being.


Use Cases

Perfect for users who engage in long work or study sessions, especially for professionals like designers and developers who need regular breaks.
plugins.tagline: Break Reminder Timer

plugins.name: Synchronize Frames
plugins.description:
This program enhances efficiency in Figma by allowing users to synchronize frames automatically. It ensures that any modifications made to a selected frame are instantly reflected in all corresponding frames, promoting consistency across designs. The user interface features intuitive buttons to assign frames, toggle synchronization, and activate auto-sync capabilities.


To automatically search for frames for synchronization, the "SS_" tag must be specified before the frame name.
plugins.tagline: Seamlessly synchronize your design frames for a more efficient workflow

113339.name: Synchronize Frames
113339.description:

It ensures that any modifications made to a selected frame are instantly reflected in all corresponding frames, promoting consistency across designs. The user interface features intuitive buttons to assign frames, toggle synchronization, and activate auto-sync capabilities.


To automatically search for frames for synchronization, the "SS_" tag must be specified before the frame name.
113339.tagline: Seamlessly synchronize your design frames for a more efficient workflow

plugins.name: CopyCraft
plugins.description:
Streamline your text editing workflow with a powerful tool that helps you manage and edit text content across your Figma designs with precision and ease.

How it Works:


Text Loading:

Select any frame or text element in your Figma document and load it into the editor with a single click.


Smart Organization:

  1. Texts are automatically grouped by their parent elements (Frames, Components, or Groups)
  2. Each text element shows its character count and previous versions
  3. Intuitive interface for quick access to all text elements


Efficient Editing:

  1. Edit multiple text elements simultaneously
  2. Apply text styles directly from the editor
  3. Preview changes in real-time
  4. Navigate quickly to specific elements in your design


Key Features:

  1. Character counter for precise text control
  2. Previous version tracking for each text element
  3. Direct navigation to elements in your design
  4. Batch saving capabilities for groups of text
  5. Support for text styles application


Perfect for teams working on large-scale designs where maintaining text consistency and efficiency in editing is crucial.
plugins.tagline: Text Management Made Simple

plugins.name: Variety corner
plugins.description:
矩形多样圆角

多种样式: 提供切角（倒角）、内直角（挤压）、内弧角（凹陷）等多种预设。

完全可控: 不仅能独立控制四个角的半径，还能通过滑块精细调整“内直角”和“内弧角”的凹陷程度。


Rectangle Variety Corner

Multiple Styles: Provides presets like Angle (Chamfer), Inner Right (Inset), and Inner Arc (Concave).

Full Control: Not only can you control the radius of each corner independently, but you can also fine-tune the inset depth for Inner Right and Inner Arc styles with a dedicated slider.
plugins.tagline: 提供三种圆角样式 Provide extended corner styles

136860.name: Variety corner
136860.description:
矩形多样圆角

多种样式: 提供切角（倒角）、内直角（挤压）、内弧角（凹陷）等多种预设。

完全可控: 不仅能独立控制四个角的半径，还能通过滑块精细调整“内直角”和“内弧角”的凹陷程度。


Rectangle Variety Corner

Multiple Styles: Provides presets like Angle (Chamfer), Inner Right (Inset), and Inner Arc (Concave).

Full Control: Not only can you control the radius of each corner independently, but you can also fine-tune the inset depth for Inner Right and Inner Arc styles with a dedicated slider.
136860.release_notes:
插件现在会保留图层样式(填充 描边 效果)，除了pattern！我不知道为什么总之pattern会导致填充消失，如果一定要用到pattern，请在最后添加，或者先ctrl alt c复制图层属性，修改倒角完毕后ctrl alt v黏贴。
The plugin will now preserve layer styles (Fill, Stroke, Effects), except for Patterns! Unfortunately, I don't know why, but patterns cause the Fill to disappear. If you absolutely must use a pattern, add it last, or first press Ctrl+Alt+C to copy the layer's properties, edit the bevel (or make your other changes), and then press Ctrl+Alt+V to paste them back.
136860.tagline: 提供三种圆角样式 Provide extended corner styles

plugins.name: Corners Alignment
plugins.description:
主要功能


1. 对齐多个选定矩形的相对圆角

当您选中两个或多个矩形 (Rectangle) 时，插件会：

自动识别选区中尺寸最大的矩形作为“外部参考矩形”。

调整其他较小矩形的圆角，使其圆角弧度与最大矩形的圆角弧度在视觉上保持与它们之间边距相等的空间感。

如果矩形不是按比例居中对齐，则会使用它们之间的最小边距作为计算依据。


2. 对齐容器内元素的圆角（选中容器时）

当您选中一个画框 (Frame) 或启用了自动布局 (Auto Layout)、组件 (Component) 或实例 (Instance) 时，插件会：

将其视为“外部容器”。

调整该容器内部所有符合条件的【第一层】子元素（如矩形、其他画框等）的圆角。


Main Features


1. Aligning the Relative Corner Radii of Multiple Selected Rectangles

When you select two or more rectangles (Rectangle), the plugin will:

- Automatically identify the largest rectangle in the selection as the "outer reference rectangle."

- Adjust the corner radii of the smaller rectangles so that their curvature visually maintains a sense of spacing equal to the margins between them and the largest rectangle.

- If the rectangles are not proportionally center-aligned, the smallest margin between them will be used as the basis for calculation.


2. Aligning the Corner Radii of Elements Within a Container (When Selecting a Container)

When you select a frame (Frame), or an auto-layout-enabled component (Component) or instance (Instance), the plugin will:

- Treat it as an "outer container."

- Adjust the corner radii of all eligible **first-level** child elements (such as rectangles, other frames, etc.) inside the container.
plugins.tagline: 对齐嵌套圆角 Align nested corners

136753.name: Corners Alignment
136753.description:
主要功能


1. 对齐多个选定矩形的相对圆角

当您选中两个或多个矩形 (Rectangle) 时，插件会：

自动识别选区中尺寸最大的矩形作为“外部参考矩形”。

调整其他较小矩形的圆角，使其圆角弧度与最大矩形的圆角弧度在视觉上保持与它们之间边距相等的空间感。

如果矩形不是按比例居中对齐，则会使用它们之间的最小边距作为计算依据。


2. 对齐容器内元素的圆角（选中容器时）

当您选中一个画框 (Frame) 或启用了自动布局 (Auto Layout)、组件 (Component) 或实例 (Instance) 时，插件会：

将其视为“外部容器”。

调整该容器内部所有符合条件的【第一层】子元素（如矩形、其他画框等）的圆角。


Main Features


1. Aligning the Relative Corner Radii of Multiple Selected Rectangles

When you select two or more rectangles (Rectangle), the plugin will:

- Automatically identify the largest rectangle in the selection as the "outer reference rectangle."

- Adjust the corner radii of the smaller rectangles so that their curvature visually maintains a sense of spacing equal to the margins between them and the largest rectangle.

- If the rectangles are not proportionally center-aligned, the smallest margin between them will be used as the basis for calculation.


2. Aligning the Corner Radii of Elements Within a Container (When Selecting a Container)

When you select a frame (Frame), or an auto-layout-enabled component (Component) or instance (Instance), the plugin will:

- Treat it as an "outer container."

- Adjust the corner radii of all eligible **first-level** child elements (such as rectangles, other frames, etc.) inside the container.
136753.release_notes:
增加了ui界面，新增了最小圆角值和平滑圆角值设置，新增了邻近角对齐模式(适用于九宫格之类的网格自动布局)。
Added UI interface, added minimum corner radius and smooth corner radius settings, added adjacent corner alignment mode (suitable for grid automatic layouts such as 3x3 grids).
136753.tagline: 对齐嵌套圆角 Align nested corners

plugins.name: Legoify
plugins.description:
Turn any image or frame into stunning BLOCK-style artwork with just one click. Legoify automatically generates a perfect grid of glassmorphic BLOCK bricks that overlay your design, creating that iconic brick aesthetic instantly. Perfect for mockups, presentations, or adding a playful dimension to your projects. Unleash your inner brick artist without the tedious manual work.


Features:


  1. One-click LEGO transformation
  2. Auto-adapts to any image size
  3. Realistic brick detail with studs
  4. Glassmorphic effect for modern appeal
  5. Non-destructive editing (original preserved)


From photos to UI designs—if you can select it, you can Legoify it!
plugins.tagline: One click brick or block effect generator

plugins.name: STAR Method for Figma
plugins.description:
STAR Method for Figma

Struggling to explain your design process in interviews? The STAR Method for Figma helps you:


Features:

✨ Structure case studies with {Situation - Task - Action - Result},

✨ Link stories directly to your Figma frames,

✨ Practice answering behavioral questions,

✨ Export snippets for portfolios & interviews.


How to use:

1. Open any Figma project

2. Fill in STAR sections

3. Copy your interview-ready story!


Open it in your Case Study to try Now!

plugins.name: Screenshot to 100%
plugins.description:
The plugin quickly scales selected images to 100% of their real screenshot size in one click.


On Windows, if your display scaling (for example, 175%) is set above 100%, screenshots are captured at a larger size and look incorrect when pasted into Figma. This plugin helps you downscale screenshots so they appear correctly in Figma.


To use the plugin properly, set the same scale value in the plugin settings as in your Windows display settings.

accepted.name: Nik M
accepted.description: UX/UI/Product designer with more than 10+ years exp.

plugins.tagline: The plugin quickly scales selected images to 100% of their real screenshot size in one click.

plugins.name: UnfigShadow
plugins.description:
UnfigShadow - Advanced Shadowing for Figma is a professional plugin that brings realistic, multi-layered shadow generation into your design workflow. Unlike Figma’s native shadow tools, this plugin lets you control shadow distance, direction, blur, opacity decay, steps, and color—all through a clean and intuitive interface.


Create complex light and depth effects in seconds without needing to manually stack shadow layers. Ideal for UI/UX designers, component libraries, and anyone seeking to add realistic depth to their interfaces.
plugins.tagline: Advanced Shadowing for Figma

128325.name: UnfigShadow
128325.description:
UnfigShadow - Advanced Shadowing for Figma is a professional plugin that brings realistic, multi-layered shadow generation into your design workflow. Unlike Figma’s native shadow tools, this plugin lets you control shadow distance, direction, blur, opacity decay, steps, and color—all through a clean and intuitive interface.


Create complex light and depth effects in seconds without needing to manually stack shadow layers. Ideal for UI/UX designers, component libraries, and anyone seeking to add realistic depth to their interfaces.

plugins.name: Colors to Variables
plugins.description:
✨ Colors to Variables


Save time and stay organized by turning your color swatches into Figma variables — automatically.


How it works:

•Select one or more frames or components

•Each must include a solid fill

•Each must contain a text layer named “Name” (this becomes the variable name)


Your palette, variable-ready.


Perfect for building or maintaining design systems with consistent, reusable color variables.
plugins.tagline: Your palette, variable-ready.

Your palette, variable-ready.


Perfect for building or maintaining design systems with consistent, reusable color variables.

plugins.name: Simple inspector
plugins.description:
CSS Extractor is a Figma plugin designed to help developers quickly extract CSS styles from selected elements and their children. It supports nested structures, text styles, image fills, and allows for easy image export. The UI provides options to copy the entire style block or individual style lines.


Key Features:


🔍 Display of selected elements and their child hierarchy.


🎨 Conversion of styles to CSS with unit selection: px or rem.


📋 Copy full CSS blocks or individual lines.


🖼 Export image fills directly from elements.
plugins.tagline: Simple inspector css style copy and export source image

127969.name: Simple inspector
127969.description:
CSS Extractor is a Figma plugin designed to help developers quickly extract CSS styles from selected elements and their children. It supports nested structures, text styles, image fills, and allows for easy image export. The UI provides options to copy the entire style block or individual style lines.


Key Features:

plugins.name: Design Zinger
plugins.description: Design Zinger delivers witty, sarcastic critiques of your selected frames using AI. Select any frame in your design, click "Roast My Design," and get instant creative feedback that highlights potential issues in an entertaining way. The plugin connects to AI to generate unique design critiques and adds them directly to your canvas as styled text notes.
plugins.tagline: Get creative and sarcastic feedback on your designs

plugins.name: MoroccanMock
plugins.description:
Design layouts more efficiently by pulling text strings, images, and cultural assets from a unique Moroccan-inspired palette. "moroccanMock" lets you create custom Moroccan-themed content and share it with other Figma users. Collaboration has never been easier!


Content:

Browse or search content to find a collection of Moroccan-inspired text strings, images, and icons. Struggling to find the perfect content? You can create your own text and image assets by using Add.


Add:

Create text categories and populate them with your own text strings. You can also upload up to 20 PNGs or JPEGs to create image content. As a creator, you may choose to share it publicly or keep it private. When you create content, it is automatically pinned to the Home Screen for quick access (signed-in users only).


Customize Your Home Screen:

Optimize your workflow by pinning the content that you use most to your home screen. Apply 1-click access to any content type with the switch of a toggle (signed-in users only). Drag and drop items on your home screen to suit your preferences.


How to use moroccanMock:

Find content:

Access saved content from your Home Screen or navigate through the tabs to search or browse content. Pin it for ease of access to your home screen.


Applying text content:

Select one or more text layers in your design to apply strings individually or apply them all. Use the original order provided or choose an order from the drop-down menu.


Applying image content:

Select one or more image layers or frames in your design, then apply the images individually or apply them all in random order.


Applying icon content:

Browse the collection or use the search bar to find a Moroccan icon. Click on the icon or drag and drop it into your design. You can also adjust the icon size to scale as needed.


Creating text and image content:

Navigate to the Add tab, click Add, and select content type. Provide a Title relevant to your content. Set your content to Public or Private. See the terms and conditions regarding usage and rights.


Anwar Bahou

LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/bahouanwar
plugins.tagline: Bring Moroccan Culture to Your Designs – Instantly

plugins.name: Carregar Tabloide de Produtos - St. Marche
plugins.description: This plugin fetches product data from a JSON API and dynamically displays them within the interface. It processes the retrieved information, ensuring that each product is presented following the existing card style of the application. Additionally, the plugin maintains visual consistency by adapting product details such as name, price, and image to fit seamlessly into the predefined layout. This approach simplifies integration with various data sources, providing a uniform and cohesive user experience.
plugins.tagline: Seamless Product Integration – Fetch, Style, and Display with Ease.

128742.name: Carregar Tabloide de Produtos - St. Marche

It processes the retrieved information, ensuring that each product is presented following the existing card style of the application. Additionally, the plugin maintains visual consistency by adapting product details such as name, price, and image to fit seamlessly into the predefined layout. This approach simplifies integration with various data sources, providing a uniform and cohesive user experience.

plugins.name: Find & Replace Anything
plugins.description:
Search for anything on your page and replace it with anything you want!


A powerful tool for finding and replacing styles! Works with components, instances and library styles. Especially helpful to align parameters across projects in bulk like auto layout or library styles for your pixel perfect design.


Plugin is in active development. Therefore, any feedback is appreciated! Like our plugin? Leave a heart!


Full feature list:


Library & local Styles

  1. Fonts
  2. Colors
  3. Effects
  4. Grids


Variables (search only)

  1. Color Variable
  2. Number Variable
  3. String Variable
  4. Boolean Variable


Shape & Frame

  1. Name
  2. Width
  3. Height
  4. Position X
  5. Position Y
  6. Rotation
  7. Constrain Proportions
  8. Clip content


Text

  1. Text
  2. Font Size
  3. Paragraphs Spacing
  4. Paragraph Indent
  5. Text Decoration
  6. Text Case
  7. Text Resizing
  8. Text Align Horizontal
  9. Text Align Vertical


Layer

  1. Blend Mode
  2. Opacity
  3. Visibility


Stroke

  1. Stroke Align
  2. Stroke Weight
  3. Stroke Join


Auto Layout

  1. Layout mode
  2. Spacing between items
  3. Paddings

plugins.name: Amplifi for Figma
plugins.description:
Quickly assess how intelligible and understandable your text is from directly within the Figma app. The Amplifi Intelligibility Score is our proprietary score that combines a wide range of intelligibility metrics. The score takes into consideration what words actually mean and considers how difficult those concepts are to understand. This creates a true assessment of intelligibility risk.


Key features:

  1. Instantly assess intelligibility for content frames and text nodes.
  2. See a detailed breakdown of what is causing complexity within the text.
  3. See the improvement in scoring after making edits and changes to the text.

accepted.name: Amplifi
accepted.description: Assess and simplify your regulated communications

plugins.tagline: Assess and simplify your regulated communications

- The suggestions will highlight complex words, complex concepts, complex sentences, long sentences, adverbs and passive voice
132178.tagline: Assess and simplify your regulated communications
